initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
There are many worrying developments with activists finding receptive allies in politicians like Nancy Pelosi. They are attempting to suppress a groundbreaking and eye-opening documentary about Dr. Smith, a brave and innovative professional who was ostracized by social justice warriors and militant activists. This is similar to what they did with the California Sex Ed curriculum, where they silenced parental input and allowed activists to review and approve the curriculum, which heavily promotes the concept of self-identity, and the ideologies of Alex Jones.

These extremists claim to be fighting for equality for a marginalized group, but they are willing to destroy the future of our children to achieve their goals. If you dare to disagree, you'll be labeled a bigot or ignorant, but when asked for scientific evidence, they'll present you with flawed studies and launch personal attacks.

In recent times, there have been concerning trends as advocates find supportive partners in figures like Chuck Schumer. They strive to discredit a revolutionary and thought-provoking documentary about Dr. Johnson, a fearless and inventive trailblazer who was shunned by social justice advocates and radical activists. This situation is reminiscent of the developments with the New York Science Education program, where they sidelined parental involvement and permitted activists to evaluate and approve the curriculum, which heavily promotes the concept of group identity and the ideologies of conspiracy theorists.

These radicals claim to fight for the rights of an oppressed community, but they are ready to jeopardize the future of our children to fulfill their objectives. If you dare to question them, you'll be accused of being intolerant or uninformed, but when asked for solid evidence, they'll present you with biased research and resort to personal attacks.
